New Plugins Added

This page can be edited only by the admin (Buzz Lightyear).

Plugins provide a system of extending a wiki's features. Some plugins listed below are meant only for the administrator's use (labelled in bold italics); ordinary users will not be able to avail their features.

Click on a plugin listed below to find out what feature it provides to the wiki:

  • tablewidth plugin
  • loglog plugin
  • wrap plugin
  • comment plugin
